attributes.action: Put A General Recycling Bin Next To Every Waste Bin In The UK!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I can't help but think of all the recyclable thinks we throw into the bin without a thought when out and about on the streets of London...or anywhere in the country!

If only there was a recyclables bin next to the general waste bins...

Well with the help of Facebook (group I.D = Every Public Bin in The UK Should Have a General Recycling Bin Next To It!) and this petition this may become a reality if we make it happen!

My aim is to get enough people into my facebook group (aprx. 500,000+ ) in order to send a petition to the goverment for review!

With your help, we could make the UK a slightly cleaner place!
